text: Per Sandgaard (born 13 March 1967) is a Danish-Swedish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male equestrians Category:Swedish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Denmark Category:Equestrians at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Per Sandgaard
